results.title: Purpurinis rūkas
results.overview: 'Purple Smoke' tells the complex story of Lithuanian Jew Jozef, partisan commander Vlad and their two beloved Janes.

results.title: Club der roten Bänder - Wie alles begann
results.original_title: Club der roten Bänder - Wie alles begann

results.title: This Is Where I Meet You
results.original_title: This Is Where I Meet You

results.title: Vantha Rajavathaan Varuven
results.overview: The young heir of a rich family embarks on a journey to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

results.title: Imaginary Order
results.overview: The sexual, psychological, and moral unraveling of an obsessive-compulsive suburban mom.

results.title: Made in Abyss: Journey's Dawn
results.original_title: メイドインアビス 旅立ちの夜明け
results.overview: The enigmatic Abyss is an unforgiving and deadly place. Despite the dangers, it still captures the imagination of explorers such as Riko who wishes to follow in her mother's footsteps and trains hard to become a Cave Raider. One day, she receives news that her mother died in the Abyss, yet a mysterious note tells Riko that her mother may still be alive. Vowing to uncover the truth about her mother's fate, Riko embarks on a journey with a humanoid robot boy named Reg. Together, they will discover if they have what it takes to survive where so many others have perished.

results.title: 90 ML
results.overview: Thamara, Paru, Kajal and Suganya are four friends who are rather tired of their uneventful routine. However, things take a turn for the better with the arrival of the spirited and outgoing Rita, a young woman who encourages them to live their lives to the fullest.

results.title: Hotel Mumbai
results.overview: Based on the 2009 documentary Surviving Mumbai about the Mumbai attacks in 2008 at the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel in India.

results.title: Brugklas - de tijd van m'n leven
results.original_title: Brugklas - de tijd van m'n leven

results.title: Sonchiriya
results.overview: Story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorised the Indian heartlands.

results.title: The Golden Glove
results.overview: A serial killer strikes fear in the hearts of residents of Hamburg during the early 1970s.

results.title: Peranbu
results.overview: A single father tries to raise his daughter, who has cerebral palsy, even as she is beginning to wake up to her sexuality.

results.title: Thirty
results.overview: Twenty-four hours with a group of friends on a Friday in October in Berlin’s district of Neukölln. Övünç is suffering from writer’s block, Pascal and Raha split up recently and are trying to stay friends. Kara constantly sublets her flat to keep herself moving. Henner spends the day in a bar and meets a girl by the name of Anja. That evening they celebrate Övünç’s birthday and drift together through the city’s nightlife. The film depicts six young people in their struggle with the daily grind of life in Berlin and the reality of turning thirty.

results.title: Monos
results.overview: On a faraway mountaintop, eight kids with guns watch over a hostage and a conscripted milk cow.

results.title: Our Wonderful Lives
results.overview: Margot, Jeremy, Salome, Caesar, Sonia - They are between 18 and 50 years old. Everything separates them except the urgency to rebuild and restore the relationship to the other that the addiction has destroyed. Solidary, they have as rules, sharing, honesty, authenticity, sincerity, humanity. An incredible band of living people who are screaming loudly that we are doing better than others alone.

results.title: A Young Man with High Potential
results.original_title: A Young Man with High Potential
results.overview: Piet, who is studying computer science, is as inexperienced sexually as he is intelligent. When he notices that his feelings for Klara, a fellow student, are not really reciprocal, he is deeply hurt. After trying out sleeping pills on himself, he drugs Klara, with unexpected consequences.

results.title: Kumbalangi Nights
results.overview: The movie revolves around 4 siblings living in the fishing hamlet of Kumbalangi.

results.title: Keluarga Cemara
results.overview: Tells about Abah and Emak who have to face problems. Then their two children, Euis and Ara must face the new situation that befell their family. Euis who had to change schools and adapt to her new friends, and Abah who had to change jobs. A simple family story full of warmth and affection.

results.title: Official Secrets
results.overview: The true story of British intelligence whistle- blower Katharine Gun, who prior to the 2003 Iraq invasion leaked a top-secret NSA memo exposing a joint US-UK illegal spying operation against members of the UN Security Council. The memo proposed blackmailing member states into voting for war.

results.title: The Wolf's Call
results.overview: Thriller set in the milieu of French nuclear submarines.
